channel.title: RSCD v25 security holes and issues?
channel.description:
I got few quick questions to the people that know about it.
1) Are there any security holes except 123.txt in rscd v25 website source? If there is, then what? Also, if they sql inject, then from which form and how to fix? 2) How to make it so people who log in get added to rscd_online table, so the website's "Online on <servername>:<playercount>"?
Thanks in advance, hoping to get some positive mature responses.

item.title: RSCD v25 security holes and issues?
item.dc:creator: @EndlessLife EndlessLife
item.description:
@EndlessLife wrote:

I also got this problem, the guys Bannana and Usd, are keep Giving theirself items Like Party hats ect, wich Shoulndt be Possable And setting theirself to level 99 in every skill…

Is this same problem?

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v25 security holes and issues?
item.dc:creator: @dear_god1 dear god
item.description:
@dear_god1 wrote:

[quote=“Stashah, post:7, topic:237573”][quote author=bigh51 link=topic=313669.msg2497212#msg2497212 date=1224454728]

[quote author=Stashah link=topic=313669.msg2496678#msg2496678 date=1224437116]
Nothing helpful yet.

Still waiting.
[/quote]I believe there is a hidden one that only a few people know about, but I’m not sure.
[/quote]Well if people like mapu, Kyle and mubby know about it, then it must be kind of a public.

Waiting…[/quote]

Actually, they didn’t use a security hole.

the thing they used was YOUR fault, because the ‘test’ forum acc was 1 instead of 4.
I even went on there to look around myself, didn’t touch anything though.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCD v25 security holes and issues?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

[quote=“Stashah, post:1, topic:237573”]I got few quick questions to the people that know about it.

  1. Are there any security holes except 123.txt in rscd v25 website source? If there is, then what? Also, if they sql inject, then from which form and how to fix?
  2. How to make it so people who log in get added to rscd_online table, so the website’s “Online on :”?

Thanks in advance, hoping to get some positive mature responses.[/quote]

Simplest fix, write your own account manager with SQL injection and XSS in mind. You’ll spend a lot more time fixing loopholes in someone else’s work.

Read full topic
